channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI

item.title: Report E-2024040509
item.description:
Report E-2024040509

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-25T15:11:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-14
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING UNLOADING OPERATIONS, THE HIGH-LEVEL SENSOR ON FACILITY STORAGE TANK FAILED TO OPERATE CAUSING THE TANK TO OVERFLOW AND SPILL 5 GALLONS OF PRODUCT ONTO THE RUBBER CONTAINMENT MAT. OFFLOADING OPERATIONS WERE HAULTED. BALANCE OF LOAD MOVED TO SECODARY STORAGE TANK. OFFLOADING COMPLETED WITHOUT FURTHER INCIDENT. THE SPILL WAS CLEANED UP BY PLANT PERSONNELL.

item.title: Report X-2024040904
item.description:
Report X-2024040904

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-22T15:11:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was dropped which in turn bent in a corner of the bottle, thus creating a puncture. The package was then properly oriented. DescribePack: A puncture hole about 1 mm wide had formed from the drop on the corner that the package was dropped onto. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the package was properly oriented and not moved unless needed.

item.title: Report X-2024040826
item.description:
Report X-2024040826

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-22T15:11:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-08
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE METAL PAIL WAS SHIPPED INSIDE A PLASTIC BAG THAT HAD NOT BEEN REMOVED COMPLETELY. THE METAL PAIL HAD BEEN PLACED UPON THE INCOMPATIBLE LINE. WHILE TRAVELING DOWN THE LINE, THE PLASTIC BAG HAD BECOME CAUGHT IN A TRANSITION PLATE, CAUSING THE METAL PAIL TO FALL OFF, BECOMING DENTED AND RELEASING LIQUID CONTENT. THE SPILL HAD BEEN COVERED WITH ABSORBANT PADS AND THE METAL PAIL HAD BEEN COVERED AND MOVED OUT OF REACH OF OTHER EMPLOYEES. DescribePack: Conveyer or Material Handling Equipment Mishap THE METAL PAIL WAS NOT DEFECTIVE IN ANY WAY. IT WAS JUST A SERIES OF UNFORTUNATE EVENTS THAT LED TO THE RELEASE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE METAL PAIL WAS PUT INSIDE A PLASTIC BAG, STANDING UPRIGHT AND COVERED SO THAT THE PAINT FUMES WOULD NOT ESCAPE.

item.title: Report X-2024040570
item.description:
Report X-2024040570

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-05
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found box on floor next to outbound QA desk, observed small amount of white crystal like substance on floor by bottom of box. Using PPE placed box into red hazmat tote to take to QA area for inspection DescribePack: Using PPE, which included gloves, opened box and found 50 lb. plastic pail containing Oxidizer which upon further inspection found large crack on the bottom of the plastic pail which allowed approximately 4 ounces of oxidizer to leak into bottom of box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Immediately contained box and contents into red Hazmat tote and removed from area to QA cage for inspection, after QA inspection took red tote to the Hazmat cage to await disposition.

item.title: Report X-2024040566
item.description:
Report X-2024040566

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-05
  • City: SAGINAW
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found in the unload area wet and leaking. Proper PPE was used to remove the package and it was placed into a hazmat bin. Upon inspection I found that one of the bottles had a loose cap which led to the leakage. DescribePack: Upon inspection I found that one of the bottles had a loose cap which led to the leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Proper PPE was used to remove the package and it was placed into a hazmat bin.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Cap came loose on one bottle of 100% reagent alcohol, causing the contents to leak out. The package was placed in a plastic bag and bin and taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered. DescribePack: 1 loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bag and bin and taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered.

item.title: Report X-2024040575
item.description:
Report X-2024040575

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DAMAGED LEAKING HAZMAT PAIL WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD AND BROUGHT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED. DescribePack: THE TOP OF THE PAIL IS DENTED AND WHEN TIPPED ON ITS SIDE IT DOES LEAK. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PAIL WAS TURNED UP RIGHT.
